name: TVApplicationController
desc: An object that bridges the UI, navigation stack, storage, and event handling from JavaScript.

items.name: init(context: TVApplicationControllerContext, window: UIWindow?, delegate: TVApplicationControllerDelegate?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an app controller.

items.name: func evaluate(inJavaScriptContext: (JSContext) -> Void, completion: ((Bool) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Evaluates a block in the JavaScript execution queue.

items.name: var delegate: TVApplicationControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of the app controller object.

items.name: protocol TVApplicationControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol used to observe and manage the different states of an application controller.

items.name: var context: TVApplicationControllerContext
items.desc: The launch information for the application controller.

items.name: var navigationController: UINavigationController
items.desc: The navigation controller that is bridged from JavaScript to tvOS.

items.name: var window: UIWindow?
items.desc: A reference to the window supplied when the app controller was initialized.
